100 CLS:PRINT:X=4:Y=8
110 PRINT "THE OLYMPICS ARE ABOUT TO START" 
120 PRINT 
130 PRINT "HIT THE enter TO SEE THE RINGS" 
140 PRINT "ON YOUR SCOREBOARD"; 
150 INPUT X$ 
160 CLS0
170 DIM T(16) 
180 C=RND(5):IFC=3THEN180
190 FORY=1TO16:READT(Y):NEXT
200 Y=4
210 FOR A=1 TO 16
220 READ A$
230 FOR Z=1 TO T(A)
240 FORB=1TOLEN(A$):X=12+B
250 C=VAL(MID$(A$,B,1)):IFC>5THEN280
260 SET(X,Y,C)
270 GOTO 290
280 RESET(X,Y)
290 NEXT
310 Y=Y+1:NEXT
320 NEXT
330 IFINKEY$=""THENRESTORE:GOTO180
340 DATA 1,1,1,2,3,1,1,1,1,1,1,3,2,1,1,1
350 DATA "8888888843266666665427777777315"
360 DATA "999999388888466657777719993999993"
370 DATA "66662888888888166666666637777777774"
380 DATA "777399999999708288888884656666666660"
390 DATA "8857777777774999399999288819999999992"
400 DATA "777399999999708288888884656666666660"
410 DATA "777277777777713288888884217777777775"
420 DATA "88880888888177274777775626638888883"
430 DATA "666666177277366657738828881772774"
440 DATA "8888888843266666665427777777315"
450 DATA "8888888826666666661637777777774"
460 DATA "66666663777777777388827777777775"
470 DATA "8888888826666666661637777777771"
480 DATA "888888888266666666617777777773"
490 DATA "7777777777726666618880999991"
500 DATA "99999999999993216666666213"
510 REM OLYMPIC RINGS
520 REM STEPHEN MANES
530 REM PAUL SOMERSON 1984
